metadata.inclusion: Turn on power to the socket. The LED smart bulb is automatically added within 30 seconds and flashes twice when added.
metadata.exclusion: 1. Start with the bulb powered off at the wall switch. 2. Turn on the light switch. 3. The smart bulb will flash twice when removed.
metadata.reset: 1. Starting with the bulb on, turn the switch off, pause one second and turn on again. 2. Repeat three times for a total of four cycles. 3. The smart bulb flashes twice when reset.
